code: import React from"react";import{Link,useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import projectData from"../data/projectData";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const FeaturedWorks=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"my-12 px-6 sm:px-12 md:px-20 lg:px-48",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-2xl font-semibold",children:"Latest Project"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"space-y-6 mt-4",children:projectData.slice(-3).reverse().map((work,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex flex-col md:flex-row items-center md:items-start space-y-4 md:space-y-0 md:space-x-6 border-b border-red-600 pb-6",onClick:()=>navigate("/projects/".concat(work.id)),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:work.image,alt:work.title,className:"w-full md:w-[200px] lg:w-[300px] xl:w-[500px] h-auto object-cover rounded-md shadow-md m-auto"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-start flex-1",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-lg sm:text-xl font-bold",children:work.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-sm md:text-md text-[#8695A4] font-semibold my-2 md:my-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"bg-red-600 text-white font-bold px-1 md:px-2 md:py-1 rounded-xl mr-4",children:work.year}),work.category]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"mt-2 text-gray-700 text-sm md:text-md lg:text-lg text-justify",children:work.description})]})]},work.id))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"mt-2 md:mt-6 text-end text-xs md:text-md lg:text-lg",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/allproject",className:"text-blue-600 hover:text-blue-800 font-semibold",children:"See All Projects"})})]});};export default FeaturedWorks;
